name: SON OF A BEACH! HD Re-release

description:
Son of a Beach is back! Once again fight the endless horde of giant killer crabs on a small tropical island untill you inevitably succumb to their claws and die!

Death comes for us all!

Now with updated graphics, sound design and several bug fixes*

Enjoy!
